roleset.name: emit rustling noise
roleset.note: SWISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swish' based on sentences in brown. (from swish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just emitter
example.text: Twigs cracked loudly under her feet; bushes swished and scratched at her slacks; tree branches snapped as she pushed them ruthlessly away from her.

roleset.name: move swishingly
roleset.note: SWISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swish' based on sentences in brown. (from swish.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: with cause
example.text: Haney swished the liquor in the bottom of his glass.
example.arg: the liquor in the bottom of his glass

example.name: without cause
example.text: Tall, blonde, blue-eyes, fair, buxom without being heavy, she cut a fine figure of budding womanhood as she swished among the pupils in her fresh, starched summer dress.
example.arg: in her fresh, starched summer dress
